00026 #ifndef __OgreThreadDefinesBoost_H__
00027 #define __OgreThreadDefinesBoost_H__
00028 
00029 #define OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX mutable boost::recursive_mutex OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME;
00030 #define OGRE_LOCK_AUTO_MUTEX boost::recursive_mutex::scoped_lock ogreAutoMutexLock(OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME);
00031 #define OGRE_MUTEX(name) mutable boost::recursive_mutex name;
00032 #define OGRE_STATIC_MUTEX(name) static boost::recursive_mutex name;
00033 #define OGRE_STATIC_MUTEX_INSTANCE(name) boost::recursive_mutex name;
00034 #define OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX(name) boost::recursive_mutex::scoped_lock ogrenameLock(name);
00035 #define OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX_NAMED(mutexName, lockName) boost::recursive_mutex::scoped_lock lockName(mutexName);
00036 // like OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX but mutex held by pointer
00037 #define OGRE_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX mutable boost::recursive_mutex *OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME;
00038 #define OGRE_LOCK_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX assert(OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME); boost::recursive_mutex::scoped_lock ogreAutoMutexLock(*OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME);
00039 #define OGRE_NEW_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX assert(!OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME); OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME = new boost::recursive_mutex();
00040 #define OGRE_DELETE_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX assert(OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME); delete OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME;
00041 #define OGRE_COPY_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX(from) assert(!OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME); OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME = from;
00042 #define OGRE_SET_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX_NULL OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME = 0;
00043 #define OGRE_MUTEX_CONDITIONAL(mutex) if (mutex)
00044 #define OGRE_THREAD_SYNCHRONISER(sync) boost::condition sync;
00045 #define OGRE_THREAD_WAIT(sync, mutex, lock) sync.wait(lock);
00046 #define OGRE_THREAD_NOTIFY_ONE(sync) sync.notify_one(); 
00047 #define OGRE_THREAD_NOTIFY_ALL(sync) sync.notify_all(); 
00048 // Read-write mutex
00049 #define OGRE_RW_MUTEX(name) mutable boost::shared_mutex name;
00050 #define OGRE_LOCK_RW_MUTEX_READ(name) boost::shared_lock<boost::shared_mutex> ogrenameLock(name)
00051 #define OGRE_LOCK_RW_MUTEX_WRITE(name) boost::unique_lock<boost::shared_mutex> ogrenameLock(name)
00052 // Thread-local pointer
00053 #define OGRE_THREAD_POINTER(T, var) boost::thread_specific_ptr<T> var
00054 #define OGRE_THREAD_POINTER_INIT(var) var(&deletePtr)
00055 #define OGRE_THREAD_POINTER_VAR(T, var) boost::thread_specific_ptr<T> var (&deletePtr<T>)
00056 #define OGRE_THREAD_POINTER_SET(var, expr) var.reset(expr)
00057 #define OGRE_THREAD_POINTER_GET(var) var.get()
00058 #define OGRE_THREAD_POINTER_DELETE(var) var.reset(0)
00059 // Thread objects and related functions
00060 #define OGRE_THREAD_TYPE boost::thread
00061 #define OGRE_THREAD_CREATE(name, worker) boost::thread* name = OGRE_NEW_T(boost::thread, MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL)(worker);
00062 #define OGRE_THREAD_DESTROY(name) OGRE_DELETE_T(name, thread, MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL)
00063 #define OGRE_THREAD_HARDWARE_CONCURRENCY boost::thread::hardware_concurrency()
00064 #define OGRE_THREAD_CURRENT_ID boost::this_thread::get_id()
00065 #define OGRE_THREAD_WORKER_INHERIT
00066 // Utility
00067 #define OGRE_THREAD_SLEEP(ms) boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::millisec(ms));
00068 
00069 #endif
